author: bcurtis
msg: Add support for multiple executeSql statements in transaction that returns results.

If a transaction had more than one "SELECT * FROM TABLE" statement, then only one of the executeSql callbacks would be called.  The others would not be called, even though they were successful.  This is because a transaction object had only one result set.  Changed code so that each executeSql has a result set and unique "query id" so that the query results can be sent back to the correct statement's callback.

author: jos.shepherd@hipsnip.com
msg: Fix to new Android 1.6 storage code - callback wasn't being called for empty result sets.

author: doc
msg: Change PluginManager.isPhoneGapPlugin() to be much shorter like on the BlackBerry

author: bcurtis
msg: Fix database for Android 1.x devices.  It now behaves like HTML5 database API.
